Chapter.Heading: Introduction
Chapter.Section: What is the goal of the &Convex; package? &Convex; provides structures and algorithms for convex geometry. It can handle convex, fans and polytopes. Not only the structures are provided, but also a collection of algorithms to handle those objects. Basically, it provides convex geometry to &GAP;. It is capable of communicating with the CAS polymake via the package &PolymakeInterface; and also provides several methods by itself.
